title: Leading chemical drugs dispensed in England 2018 , by items
yAxis: Number of items dispensed in millions
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of items dispensed in millions for 20 number of Items.
The Number of items dispensed in millions is highest at Item Atorvastatin and lowest at Item Bendroflumethiazide.
There is a difference of 31.8 between the maximum Item Atorvastatin and minimum Item Bendroflumethiazide.
min_summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Item, and Number of items dispensed in millions in each Item on the y axis.
The maximum Number of items dispensed in millions 41.8 is found at Item Atorvastatin and the minimum is found at Bendroflumethiazide where Item is 10.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of items dispensed in millions for 20 number of Items.
The Number of items dispensed in millions is highest at Item Atorvastatin and lowest at Item Bendroflumethiazide.
There is a difference of 31.8 between the maximum Item Atorvastatin and minimum Item Bendroflumethiazide.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Item in the x axis and Number of items dispensed in millions in the y axis.
Item Atorvastatin has the highest Number of items dispensed in millions and Bendroflumethiazide has the lowest Number of items dispensed in millions.
Second maximum Number of items dispensed in millions is found at Item Levothyroxine Sodium.
There is a difference of 31.8 between the maximum Item Atorvastatin and minimum Item Bendroflumethiazide.
The Item Atorvastatin has the highest Number of items dispensed in millions, followed by Levothyroxine Sodium, and Omeprazole. Down to the Item Bendroflumethiazide which is the lowest.
Item Bisoprolol Fumarate, and Colecalciferol have the same Number of items dispensed in millions.
The average Number of items dispensed in millions in all 20 Items is 21.74.
